messages.content: ComfyUI Toolbox is a custom node or plugin for ComfyUI that allows users to preview and save nodes.
How can you install ComfyUI Toolbox?
To install ComfyUI Toolbox, you need to go to the 'custom_nodes' directory in ComfyUI and run the command 'https://github.com/zcfrank1st/Comfyui-Toolbox.git'.
What are the pending tasks for ComfyUI Toolbox?
The pending tasks for ComfyUI Toolbox include improving frontend CSS and enabling preview video functionality.
Is ComfyUI Toolbox an official part of ComfyUI?
No, ComfyUI Toolbox is not an official part of ComfyUI. It is a custom node or plugin that extends the functionality of ComfyUI.
Who is the author of ComfyUI Toolbox?
The author of ComfyUI Toolbox is zcfrank1st, as indicated by the GitHub repository link.
Does ComfyUI Toolbox currently support previewing videos?
No, ComfyUI Toolbox does not currently support previewing videos. It is listed as one of the pending tasks (TODO) for the plugin.
Can ComfyUI Toolbox be used to save nodes?
Yes, ComfyUI Toolbox can be used to save nodes in addition to previewing them.
